title: Blox Fruits: How to Get, Upgrade, and Use the Kabucha Legendary Gun

steps.title: Kabucha is a Legendary gun.
steps.content: Kabucha is a Legendary gun. You can buy Kabucha for 1,500 Fragments from The Strongest God located on the Remote Island in the Second Sea. [1] X Research source The Remote Island is located in the southeast of the Kingdom of Rose. You can also access this island by using the Portal Fruit's C move (World Warp). Kabucha is the only thing The Strongest God sells. If you talk to The Strongest God without 1,500 Fragments in your possession, he will dismiss you.

steps.title: Kabucha is a powerful gun, especially for Spiky Trident users.
steps.content: Kabucha is a powerful gun, especially for Spiky Trident users. If you use the Spiky Trident sword, Kabucha is one of the meta gun picks to pair with it. However, even without Spiky Trident, the Kabucha is a strong gun with powerful moves. Some other swords that pair well with Kabucha are Shizu and Canvander. Kabucha works well with awakened Dark and Ice Fruits.

steps.title: Upgrading the Kabucha gives it +15% damage.
steps.content: Upgrading the Kabucha gives it +15% damage. To upgrade the Kabucha, bring 15 Dragon Scales, 3 Vampire Fangs, and 50 Leather to the Blacksmith. The Blacksmith can be found in the Pirate Village (First Sea), Kingdom of Rose (Second Sea), and Port Town (Third Sea).

steps.title: Flying Fire Bird (Z)
steps.content: Flying Fire Bird ( Z ) Mastery: 125 Mastery Damage: 4020 Cooldown: About 9 seconds Description: You shoot a projectile that looks like a flaming bird. When the projectile lands it explodes, and it leaves a flaming trail behind it. The flaming trail does AoE damage and breaks instinct.

steps.title: Intense Wind (X)
steps.content: Intense Wind ( X ) Mastery: 250 Mastery Damage: 5628 Cooldown: About 15 seconds Description: You shoot a blast of wind in a direction. The wind knocks enemies back, as well as stuns and breaks instinct.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Does decent damage Works amazingly with the Spikey Trident sword Both moves break instinct Flying Fire Bird doesn't knock back, so it's good for grinding Has the fastest fire rate of any gun in the game

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Ineffective against Rubber Fruit users Both moves are predictable and easy to dodge Flying Fire Bird's explosion doesn't break instinct Intense Wind has a small AoE Doesn't have a super long range
